summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 21, C. D. Boren's, A. A. Denny's, and H. L. Yesler's Addition to the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley between 3rd and 4th Avenues, from Marion Street to Madison Street, by grading and paving the same, with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, including sewers, together with all necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 898 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
